name: Tomato Sauce Casalinga
keywords: low-fat, vegetarian, main course, tomato sauce
recipeIngredient: 1 small onion, peeled and finely chopped
1 small carrot, peeled and finely chopped
1 small rib celery, peeled and finely chopped
2 medium mushrooms, trimmed and thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Combine onion, carrot, celery and mushrooms in a 2 1/2-quart souffle dish. Cover with a paper towel. Cook at 100 percent power in a high-power oven for 5 minutes.
Stir in tomato sauce and oregano. Cook, uncovered, for 13 minutes, stirring once. Stir in basil. Cook for 2 minutes.
Remove from oven and uncover. Stir in lemon juice, salt and pepper.
